text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Ana nkuiona uli najiŵaga (Qur’aniji) jakutyochela kwa Allah, sano jenumanja ni n’jikaanile, sano nkutendela umboni jwakuumila mu ŵanache ŵa Israila (Abdullah bin Salâm t) ni jutendele umboni pa jalakweji (kuti jakuona mpela mujaŵelele Taurat), ni jukulupilile, sano jenumanja ni n’dikwesyisye (pangajikulupilila, ana ngam’ba ŵalupuso?)” Chisimu Allah jwaangaajongola ŵandu ŵalupuso
